name: Project 10K, Inc.
description: Provider of an online publishing platform to create & share single Web pages. The company has developed a visual editor with a drag & drop interface where users can create one-pagers with media such as text, images, video recordings, files, embeddable services with YouTube, JotForm and SlideShare.
one_liner: Provider of an online publishing platform to create & share single Web pages. The company has developed a visual editor with a drag & drop interface where users can create one-pagers with media such as text, images, video recordings, files, embeddable services with YouTube, JotForm and SlideShare.
